ThingDef.description: A colossal mitochondira that has withered due to starvation.\nConnect to a well fed heart to revitalize.

ThingDef.description: The primary attachment point of a bioship spinal weapon that has withered due to starvation.\nConnect to a well fed heart to revitalize..

ThingDef.label: withered capacitor
ThingDef.description: When well fed, this efficiently stores up to 1,000Wd of energy. It has withered due to starvation.\nConnect to a well fed heart to revitalize.

ThingDef.description: A cyst in which a war beast will gestate that has withered due to starvation.\nConnect to a well fed heart to revitalize..

ThingDef.label: withered vent
ThingDef.description:
Exchanges heat with the coolant network, cooling or heating a ship's interior to the desired temperature.

Can also heat rooms with electricity.
It has withered due to starvation, provide nutrition and it can be revived.

ThingDef.label: withered docking claw
ThingDef.description:
One half of a system for attaching spacecraft. Place two of these directly adjacent to a vacuum-facing airlock, facing outward: |o| where | represents a docking clamp and o represents the airlock. The airlock will then gain the ability to extend a docking tube up to 3 tiles long.

No special equipment is necessary on the other end; simply line the tube up with the other ship's airlock. You can also connect it to other airlocks.

The tube is not rated for interplanetary travel or atmospheric re-entry so ships will automatically decouple.
